subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Boston took a 3-1 series lead with a 4-3 victory at Toronto. Later, Los Angeles defeated St. Louis in overtime to take a 3-2 lead in a Western Conference series.
snippet: Boston took a 3-1 series lead with a 4-3 victory at Toronto. Later, Los Angeles defeated St. Louis in overtime to take a 3-2 lead in a Western Conference series.
